biotools.summary: The Rare Disease Registry Framework (RDRF) is an open source tool for the creation of web-based patient registries. It enables to create and modify registries without changes to the programming code. It has many features which include its ability to create multiple registries within the same framework, patients are defined once, and the ability for curators to create data elements dynamically well after the registry has been defined.
